description: This table extracts alternate payer routing information for PB transactions.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ALT_PAYER_COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The coverage that has been routed to the alternate payer.

columns.name: ALT_PAYER_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The benefit plan that the coverage has been routed to.

columns.name: ALT_PAYER_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.
